meanings.sent1: She is the brattiest child in the class.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the kids, she is the brattiest.
meanings.sent3: Even though she's the brattiest, she can be sweet sometimes.
meanings.sent4: Her behavior was the brattiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent5: The brattiest kid always gets the most attention.

meanings.sent1: The brattiest puppy chewed up all the shoes.
meanings.sent2: He always gets into the brattiest mischief.
meanings.sent3: The brattiest cat knocked over all the plants.
meanings.sent4: Her brattiest behavior led to getting grounded.
meanings.sent5: The brattiest child in the family is also the most spoiled.

meanings.definition: Showing the most behavior characteristic of a brat.
meanings.sent1: His brattiest tantrum lasted for hours.
meanings.sent2: She displayed the brattiest behavior at the party.
meanings.sent3: The brattiest sibling always gets their way.
meanings.sent4: The brattiest student disrupted the entire class.
meanings.sent5: The brattiest dog refused to listen to any commands.
